name: A wolf's Life
description:
As a wolf you just get what your other wolf wants from the world. simple and easy.

Spent more time fighting with the character controller then I should have stupid checking for ground was doing it a weird way at first at least  I got it all fixed. 

This game is very simple you just grab items and bring them back to the cave and get another item nothing more nothing less.

Controls 

wasd for moving

space jump

shift to run

esq for menu

e to howl

Xbox controller

x - howl

a - jump

b - to run

start - menu

Most game art is made by myself

Wolf sprite made by Willam Thompsonj

(Ran out of time making my own wold sprite so used his)

music is from Deceased Superior Technician
